solution_line_template: If there are {chairs_per_row} chairs in each row in the church, the total number of chairs in the church is {chairs_per_row}*{num_rows} = <<{chairs_per_row}*{num_rows}={total_chairs}>>{total_chairs}

Since each chair holds {people_per_chair} people, {people_per_chair}*{total_chairs} = <<{people_per_chair}*{total_chairs}={total_people}>>{total_people} people must sit in all of the chairs for the church to be full.
